course.subject: LANG
course.name: Communication for Environmental Management and Technology I
course.description: This course aims to develop studentsâ€™ competence in discipline-related English, specifically communicating topics in the field of Environmental Management and Technology to the general public. Throughout the course, environmental issues will be examined, and students will learn the necessary skills to be applied in weekly communicative tasks and individual spoken and written assessments. For EVMT students only.
course.prerequisites: CORE 1403 OR CORE 1404 OR LANG 1003 (prior to 2022-23)
